title: Thermal plasma-synthesized gray-black TiO2 with abundant oxygen vacancies for high-efficiency solar desalination
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00194J, Paper
Fei Li, Chang Liu, Yuanjiang Dong, Huacheng Jin, Baoqiang Li, Fei Ding, Fangli Yuan
The preparation of TiO2 containing a large number of oxygen vacancies is achieved by thermal plasma, which reduces its energy band and achieves high efficiency seawater desalination.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
